sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../../components/ui/Card'; import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'; import Input from '../../components/ui/Input'; import Modal from '../../components/ui/Modal'; import Badge from '../../components/ui/Badge'; import { scholarshipsAPI } from '../../services/api'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; import { GraduationCap, Plus, Search, Filter, Eye, Edit, Trash2, Calendar, MapPin, DollarSign, Users, Building, Loader2, } from 'lucide-react'; const ScholarshipsPage = () => { const [scholarships, setScholarships] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedScholarship, setSelectedScholarship] = useState(null); const [isDetailModalOpen, setIsDetailModalOpen] = useState(false); const [isAddModalOpen, setIsAddModalOpen] = useState(false); // Fetch scholarships from API useEffect(() => { fetchScholarships(); }, []); const fetchScholarships = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const response = await scholarshipsAPI.getAll(); if (response.data.success) { setScholarships(response.data.data.scholarships); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching scholarships:', error); toast.error('Failed to fetch scholarships'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; // Mock data - replace with actual API calls const mockScholarships = [ { id: 1, name: 'Harvard MBA Scholarship', programs: ['MBA', 'Executive MBA'], country: 'United States', universityName: 'Harvard Business School', logo: '/api/placeholder/64/64', intakeDate: '2024-09-01', deadline: '2024-03-15', majors: ['Business Administration', 'Management', 'Finance'], description: 'Full scholarship for MBA program at Harvard Business School.', fee: 0, status: 'published', created_at: '2024-01-15', applications_count: 156, }, { id: 2, name: 'MIT PhD Fellowship', programs: ['PhD'], country: 'United States', universityName: 'Massachusetts Institute of Technology', logo: '/api/placeholder/64/64', intakeDate: '2024-09-01', deadline: '2024-02-28', majors: ['Computer Science', 'Engineering', 'Physics'], description: 'Fully funded PhD fellowship in various engineering and science disciplines.', fee: 0, status: 'published', created_at: '2024-01-10', applications_count: 89, }, { id: 3, name: 'Oxford Masters Scholarship', programs: ['Master\'s', 'MPhil'], country: 'United Kingdom', universityName: 'University of Oxford', logo: '/api/placeholder/64/64', intakeDate: '2024-10-01', deadline: '2024-04-01', majors: ['Literature', 'History', 'Philosophy'], description: 'Partial scholarship for Master\'s programs in humanities.', fee: 5000, status: 'draft', created_at: '2024-01-20', applications_count: 34, }, ]; const filteredScholarships = scholarships.filter( (scholarship) => scholarship.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || scholarship.country.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || scholarship.university_name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || scholarship.program?.some(program => program.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())) || scholarship.major.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const handleViewDetails = (scholarship) => { setSelectedScholarship(scholarship); setIsDetailModalOpen(true); }; const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const variants = { Active: 'success', Inactive: 'secondary', Draft: 'warning', }; return {status}; }; return (
{/* Header */}

Scholarships

Manage scholarship opportunities and track applications.

{/* Search and Filters */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="pl-10" />
{/* Scholarships Grid */} {loading ? (
Loading scholarships...
) : filteredScholarships.length === 0 ? (

No scholarships found

{searchTerm ? 'Try adjusting your search terms.' : 'Get started by adding your first scholarship opportunity.'}

) : (
{filteredScholarships.map((scholarship) => (
{scholarship.name}
{scholarship.country}
{getStatusBadge(scholarship.status)}
{/* University */}

{scholarship.university_name}

{/* Programs */}
{scholarship.program?.map((program, index) => ( {program} ))}
{/* Major */}
{scholarship.major}
{/* Intake Date */}
Intake: {new Date(scholarship.intake_date).toLocaleDateString()}
{/* Deadline */}
Deadline: {new Date(scholarship.deadline).toLocaleDateString()}
{/* Fee */}
Fee: {scholarship.application_fee === 0 ? 'Free' : `$${scholarship.application_fee}`}
{/* Applications */}
{scholarship.application_count || 0} applications
{/* Actions */}
))}
)} {/* Scholarship Detail Modal */} setIsDetailModalOpen(false)} title={selectedScholarship?.name} size="lg" > {selectedScholarship && (
{/* Scholarship Info */}

{selectedScholarship.name}

{selectedScholarship.universityName}

{selectedScholarship.country}

{selectedScholarship.fee === 0 ? 'Free' : `$${selectedScholarship.fee}`}

{getStatusBadge(selectedScholarship.status)}

{selectedScholarship.applications_count} applications

{new Date(selectedScholarship.intakeDate).toLocaleDateString()}

{new Date(selectedScholarship.deadline).toLocaleDateString()}

{/* Programs */}
{selectedScholarship.programs.map((program, index) => ( {program} ))}
{/* Majors */}
{selectedScholarship.majors.map((major, index) => ( {major} ))}
{/* Description */}

{selectedScholarship.description}

{/* Actions */}
)} {/* Add Scholarship Modal - Placeholder */} setIsAddModalOpen(false)} title="Add New Scholarship" size="lg" >

Add scholarship functionality would be implemented here with a form containing:

  • Scholarship Name
  • Program (checkbox + add new)
  • Country
  • University Name
  • Logo URL
  • Intake Date
  • Deadline
  • Major
  • Description
  • Fee
  • Status
); }; export default ScholarshipsPage;
